item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, January 5, 2025 at 1:20 AM UTC
item.description:

23. Meta is killing off its AI-powered Instagram and Facebook profiles (267 points | 384 comments)

25. Programming as Theory Building (1985) [pdf] (176 points | 32 comments)
26. "AI" on a Calculator (2023) (52 points | 13 comments)
27. B-Trees: More Than I Thought I'd Want to Know (281 points | 14 comments)
